common.cleartext: Include this field with any value to indicate that the file is in clear text (not encoded).
common.debug_level: Logging level: ALL TRACE DEBUG INFO WARN ERROR FATAL OFF
common.private_ip: Private IP address of this server
common.fqdn: Fully qualified domain name of this server

https.certificate: Full path to the certificate file
https.private_key: Full path to the private key file

zendesk.private_ip: IP address of the zendesk/fendesk server
zendesk.port: Port number of the zendesk/fendesk server
zendesk.protocol: zendesk is http, fendesk is https
zendesk.user_id: email address of the zendesk user

sip.public: Fully qualified domain name of the Asterisk server
sip.private_ip: Private IP address of the Asterisk server
sip.stun: Fully qualified domain name of the stun server

complaint.number: Asterisk dial-in number for the complaint queue

videomail.number: Asterisk dial-in number for the videomail queue

ace_direct.https_listen_port: Port that the ACE Direct portal listens on

acr_cdr.https_listen_port: Port that the ACR CDR portal listens on

management_portal.https_listen_port: Port that the Management Portal listens on
management_portal.queues: Comma-separated values of the Asterisk queues
management_portal.poll_interval: Poll frequency (seconds) of the Management Portal statistics

videomail.max_record_secs: Maximum time (seconds) for a video mail

user_service.ip: Private IP address of the USERVER server
user_service.port: Port number of the USERVER server
user_service.protocol: Protocol of the USERVER server: https

agent_service.ip: Private IP address of the ASERVER server
agent_service.port: Port number of the ASERVER server
agent_service.protocol: Protocol of the ASERVER server: https

json_web_token.encoding: Encoding scheme for the JSON web token
json_web_token.secret_key: Unique string key for the JSON web token

session.secret_key: Unique string key for the session

openam.fqdn: Fully qualified domain name of this server
openam.private_ip: Private IP address of this server

mysql.host: Private IP address of the ACE Direct MySQL server
mysql.user: Username for the ACE Direct MySQL user
mysql.password: Password for the ACE Direct MySQL user
mysql.port: Port number for the ACE Direct MySQL server

redis.host: Local IP address of the Redis server: 127.0.0.1

complaint_redirect.active: Complaint portal redirect? true or false

popticket.url: URL of zendesk pop ticket; omit this field to skip zendesk pop

nginx.fqdn: Fully qualified domain name of the NGINX server

videomail.number: Asterisk dial-in number for videomail queue

skinny_mode.agent: Enable skinny mode for agent portal: true or false
skinny_mode.consumer: Enable skinny mode for consumer portal: true or false
